meanings.definition: A food consisting of two or more slices of bread with a filling between them.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat sandwiches for lunch.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best sandwiches with ham and cheese.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone fought over the last sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a sandwich, warm and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread filled the room, making me crave a sandwich.

meanings.definition: To make or consume a sandwich.
meanings.sent1: I will sandwiches for our road trip tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She sandwiches quickly before heading to work.
meanings.sent3: He sandwiches so fast, it's like a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: Time sandwiches all our memories together, creating a tapestry of life.
meanings.sent5: The chef sandwiches with precision, creating culinary masterpieces.
